hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prohibited having images in the house, and he prohibited making them." He said: There are narrations on this topic from 'Ali, Abu Talhah, 'Aishah, Abu Hurairah, and Abu Ayyub. [Abu 'Eisa said:] The Hadith of Jabir is a Hasan Sahih Hadith

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Images
